body: (@ OnlineLoner) Can't be helped; if I read the publication date right, this was drawn up before either Railgun Manga Chapter 62, or NT Volume 11, so the artist chose to portray the second-best candidate for the future Mrs. Kamijou Touma as a slutty bitch (P.S., there may be only one girl better than Misaki, but IMHO, it ain't Misaka Mikoto!)
This author has godly art. Looking forward to his/her future works! ^^
I never liked it when doujin artist portray misaki as a whore when she has an obvious crush on touma even before the amnesia.
Misaka : How did it come to this?         Me : Exactly what I want to know too!
